portfolio.title: IMS Connect

portfolio.title: Bizmaster
portfolio.description: An e-commerce platform designed to streamline business management. It features a user-friendly dashboard for managing profiles, products, and orders, supports both buyers and sellers, and integrates multiple payment options like PayPal, Mpesa, and pay-on-delivery.

portfolio.title: EventSync
portfolio.description: EventSync is an AI-powered event management platform designed to streamline the planning and execution of events. It leverages artificial intelligence to automate tasks such as scheduling, attendee management, and personalized communication.

portfolio.title: tasty01
portfolio.description: A food delivery platform that connects customers with local restaurants. It features a user-friendly interface for browsing menus, placing orders, and tracking deliveries in real-time.
